timeline.bodyText:
Good catch! This should have been removed in #6792 when we dropped the GraalVM 19.2.1 support.
The build failed because you need to remove the ForkJoinPool import. Could you fix that please?
timeline.author: gwenneg

replies.bodyText: Thanks! Let's see if CI is happy with this in native mode now.
replies.author: gwenneg

replies.bodyText: Should be, I went through the same issue with http://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/6758 :)
replies.author: pivovarit
